SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.service

Class RecruiterService

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.service.RecruiterService
@Service public class RecruiterService extends Object
Service class for managing recruiter operations This class handles CRUD operations for candidates, authentication and logic integration

  • Constructor Details

    • RecruiterService

      @Autowired public RecruiterService(RecruiterRepository recruiterRepository, JobAdRepository jobAdRepository, org.springframework.security.crypto.password.PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder, AuthenticationService authenticationService)
      Constructor for dependencies.
      Parameters:
      recruiterRepository - repository for managing recruiter entities.
      jobAdRepository - repository for managing JobAd entities.
      passwordEncoder - service for encoding password for security.
      authenticationService - service for managing authentication.

  • Method Details

    • saveRecruiter

      @Transactional public void saveRecruiter(UserDTO user)
      Saves a new recruiter in database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user details in a UserDTO object
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if the username or email already exists

    • updateRecruiter

      @Transactional public void updateRecruiter(Recruiter updatedRecruiter, String password)
      Updates the details of the currently logged-in recruiter.
      Parameters:
      updatedRecruiter - the Recruiter object containing updated details
      password - the current password of the recruiter for verification
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - if the given password does not match the recruiter's current password

    • deleteRecruiter

      @Transactional public boolean deleteRecruiter(String deletePassword)
      Deletes the currently logged-in recruiter from the system. Also removes all job ads associated with the recruiter.
      Parameters:
      deletePassword - the current password of the recruiter for verification
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful
      Throws:
      IncorrectPasswordException - if the given password does not match the recruiter's current password
